00116     //must be specialized for every viennacl matrix type
00117     template <typename ROWCOL, typename MATRIXTYPE>
00118     struct MATRIX_ITERATOR_INCREMENTER
00119     {
00120       static void apply(const MATRIXTYPE & mat, unsigned int & row, unsigned int & col)
00121       {
00122           typedef typename MATRIXTYPE::ERROR_SPECIALIZATION_FOR_THIS_MATRIX_TYPE_MISSING          ErrorIndicator;
00123       }
00124     };
